sn44.4:3.1: 4. Dutiyasāriputtakoṭṭhikasutta
sn44.4:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto, āyasmā ca mahākoṭṭhiko bārāṇasiyaṃ viharanti isipatane migadāye … pe …
sn44.4:4.3: “Ko nu kho, āvuso, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn44.4:4.4: “Rūpaṃ kho, āvuso, ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpasamudayaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:4.6: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:4.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti.
sn44.4:4.11: viññāṇaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇasamudayaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ajānato apassato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:4.13: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa hoti;
sn44.4:4.14: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”tipissa hoti.
sn44.4:5.1: Rūpañca kho, āvuso, jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpasamudayaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, rūpanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti … pe …
sn44.4:5.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.4:5.6: viññāṇaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇasamudayaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, viññāṇanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ jānato passato yathābhūtaṃ, ‘hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:5.7: ‘na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:5.8: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti;
sn44.4:5.9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’tipissa na hoti.
sn44.4:5.10: Ayaṃ kho, āvuso, hetu ayaṃ paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ bhagavatā”ti.
